price: ‹ ߝߙߊߥߎ߲߫ › ߞߊ߲߫ ߞߏ߫ ߊߟߎ߫ ߟߊ߫ ߞߋߟߊ ߡߍ߲ ߗߋߣߍ߲߫ ߊߟߎ߫ ߡߊ߬ ߣߌ߲߬ ߝߊ߬ߕߐ ߟߋ߫ ߘߋ߬
arabic: قَالَ إِنَّ رَسُولَكُمُ ٱلَّذِيٓ أُرۡسِلَ إِلَيۡكُمۡ لَمَجۡنُونٞ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: qāla inna rasūlakumu alladhī ur'sila ilaykum lamajnūnun
